com.nearinfinity.honeycomb.mysql.schema
Class TableSchema

java.lang.Object
  com.nearinfinity.honeycomb.mysql.schema.TableSchema

public final class TableSchema
extends Object

Stores the column and index metadata information defined on a table. Internal application type used to wrap the serialized AvroTableSchema type

Constructor Summary

schemaCopy

public TableSchema schemaCopy()
Produce a copy of the current schema such that the two schemas are independent each other. A change to the copy doesn't affect the original.

Returns:
New independent table schema
